cyclone.name: FERNAND
cyclone.current_location: about 160 mi E of La Pesca, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest toward the northeastern Mexican coast, remaining well south of the Texas coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near La Pesca to Barra del Tordo, northeastern Mexico

weather_observation.watch_coast: none (watch area not yet issued for Texas coast)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Barra del Tordo (MX) northward to the Mouth of the Rio Grande River
weather_observation.impacted_coast: northeastern Mexico coast and the lower Texas coast (mainly south of Corpus Christi)
weather_observation.wind: Occasional squalls with gusts approaching tropical-storm force mainly south of Corpus Christi; sustained gales unlikely
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the middle Texas coast
weather_observation.rainfall: 2–4 inches with isolated 6 inches possible as outer bands move ashore
weather_observation.other_hazards: Rough seas and minor coastal flooding possible south of the port
